description: Comprehensive sample utterances for OrderFamilyDinnerIntent covering various natural ways customers might request family dinners
notes: Covers both Hong Kong and Peking style options through {FamilyDinnerStyle} slot
Includes number of people variations through {NumberOfPeople} slot
Contains pricing inquiries and menu content questions
Includes reservation-style language common in restaurant contexts
Uses variations like 'set', 'package', 'meal', 'dinner' for natural language diversity
